meanings.sent1: The room was skylighted, allowing natural light to brighten the space.
meanings.sent2: The skylighted attic was a cozy place to read on sunny days.
meanings.sent3: The skylighted kitchen made cooking a delight with the sun shining in.
meanings.sent4: Her skylighted smile lit up the room like a beacon of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The skylighted view of the stars at night was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: The skylighted bedroom felt airy and spacious.
meanings.sent2: The skylighted hallway was a unique feature of the house.
meanings.sent3: The skylighted bathroom was a favorite spot for relaxing baths.
meanings.sent4: His skylighted office provided a clear view of the sky above.
meanings.sent5: The skylighted greenhouse was perfect for growing plants all year round.

meanings.sent1: The skylighted gallery showcased the artwork in natural light.
meanings.sent2: The skylighted living room felt warm and inviting during the day.
meanings.sent3: The skylighted classroom made learning more enjoyable for the students.
meanings.sent4: Her skylighted face glowed with happiness under the open sky.
meanings.sent5: The skylighted path through the forest was magical in the morning light.
